headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: cdn.jsdelivr.net; font-src fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' vitals.vercel-insights.com; media-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; prefetch-src 'none'; child-src 'none'; frame-src 'none'; worker-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; form-action 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests; block-all-mixed-content
